ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(ISBLANK( Team_Signoff_Status_Details__c), OR( ISPICKVAL( Team_Signoff_Status__c, "Yes / does not meet criteria"), ISPICKVAL( Team_Signoff_Status__c, "No")), false)
